description: Erection of a rear extension at first floor level; erection of a single storey rear extension with a green roof above, following the demolition of existing conservatory; erection of a new dormer window following the removal of existing, and installation of a rooflight in the front roofslope; installation of 2no. rooflights in the side roofslope; removal of an existing rooflight, and installation of 2no. rooflights in the rear roofslope; installation of new double glazed timber windows to replace all existing; installation of metal railings to the windows to the front and rear elevations of the hipped roof at second floor level; installation of a green roof above the flat roof, a new window to the side elevation, and 3no. double glazed timber French doors with Juliette balconies following the removal of existing windows to the rear elevation at first floor level; installation of a window, and an air conditioning unit to the side elevation at ground floor level; installation of a new timber front entrance door to replace existing; erection of a new brick-built front boundary wall with metal railings above, and installation of hedges around the perimeter of the front garden; replacement of existing paved front driveway with a new green biodiversity-friendly garden.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
